devNotes.content: Hi this is ananya and youre not watching disney channel. The world is more pixar than disney and im pretty angry about it. This website acts as catharsis and i appreciate it's existence for that. https://screamintothevoid.com

Day 3 WIP 65 percent whatt is going on , 30 percent ohh i kind of get it ? , 5 percent panic Special Thanks to - JP Anoushka Aiman for helping me figure things out <3 Justified and Alignment froggy game helped tonnes! Story Chosen - The Saucy Boy

Day 7 
yellow! things that made sense and stuck with me from today-
1.owners not renters , remembering bits from the taylor's version happenings
2. if design, code , everything is incidental, what's the main quest? fun? fun.
3.  becoming an internet e x p l o r e r 
4. piles of things
5.  indieweb (bicep emoji)
6. website seedlings that grow through time 
7. phase1- loitering and frolicking, phase 2. finding purpose, phase 3 digging deep , make a  p l a n  - what to keep , what to chuck

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/84f022d0-d136-4dae-902c-333e5eb27d08)

ONIONYA.COM - ogres have layers, onions have layers, and ananya would like to believe she has layers to her thinking -shrek, the movie, 2001 .
    
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bb803c3e-9707-4376-b2d7-34482a5ef1a1)

   1- Roots - what is my school of thought, beliefs, ambitions, how did it all start. 
will contain images from school, sketches of people, sketches of cartoon shows and books and writers and youtubers and teachers and family and friends and romances - all that has inspired and put me on the path of who and where i am. ( ananyas army , like dumbledores army) (no tmi, ok maybe little tmi but ill try and stick to how i became a multi-passion creative)

   2- Bulb-  part 1 ALL ideas ( every project or idea that has given me a sliver of glimmer that has kept me awake at night or wanting to wake up the next day for)  boards, colours, experiences, inspiration ( MAY KEEP PRIVATE)
      part 2- what am i working on rn, what do i wish to collaborate on, the kind of people i am looking for to make these projects happen or ones i would like to work with for making their things happen. 
   
  3. Sprouts-  
  FLOWERS-projects ive done, new skills ive built, experiences and learnings
 ( basically the end products, the pretty stuff that the society recognizes u for)

  4. STEMS- water , sunlight, manure - the shit that keeps me going, the shit that keeps me sane - basically hobbies and hyperfixations
   will link to books, music , films, etc that im consuming / using as fun amuse fuel 



  5.LEAVES- puns and quotes and poems and anecdotes ( these will be elements  that will move on the first page)

REMEMBERTHIS.com ( working title)
glorified to do list website including watchlist, audiobook list, travel list, watchlist, checkthisoutlist of  i wanna do when i have work but convieniently flies out of my head when i do actually get time to do it. ( you an make friends groups and send reccomendations as well as ask for reccomendations) plus emojis

what more? i wanna look at my 5 years of collaging , pinterest boards, multimedia work and integrate that in the visuals.
 
ambitious stuff for later- dollhouse themed website, alice in wonderland repository website, gratitude list- thanking all the people and creators for their influence on me (dead and alive ) just a list. something related to being a massive platonic lover of the world.

shutter down, dukaan band, opens tomorrow at 9 am.

devNotes.issueTitle: Day 11: [Project Day 1] Here comes the sun
devNotes.content:
Knowing what to put on my website made me really anxious and frustrated since i would keep changing the idea i wanted to go with as well as had so many that i couldnt pick one of that would a) represent me and b) be something that will stay constantly evolving. Since i am a person who likes jumping and exploring a bunch I just.could.not.pick.one.damn.niche. And then I finally got it, i gotta zoom out. What are the general things i like and the GENERAL things that stay constant in my life - my first answer was the colour purple before i remembered that colours make me feel things pretty deeply and influence my thoughts and what if i stopped liking purple?? plus i would stay stuck choosing colours foreverrrrrrrrrrr. so back to the drawing board , how can it be made simpler- we keep it black and white for now and have three lists for my website-
1. Gratitude list- whre i write something i am thankful for every day
2.  learnings-  i am a person that has many many AHA moments, but i often forget them lol so here's where i note those down. A TIL list plus old learnings as i remember them ig.
3. One thing i like about myself or something i did. 

Working on my website making skills with w3school and looking at other people's websites plus inspecting , struggling to find nice websites that dont use javascript.

devNotes.issueTitle: Day 12: [Project Day 2] Don't stop me now
devNotes.content: long way to go! (August 5th) I tried copying codes from geocities waala personal websites but I couldnt get the hang of it in editing them.After struggling w it for long I then started writing own code with lots of help referencing w3 and chatgpt. All my elements are one below the other right now, i want them to be in columns, I revised on the froggy flex game to revise that. High hopes for August 6th in terms of progress. Thank you for reading. Initial layout idea code stuff
